description: Samsung Galaxy S25 Slim model might be launched by the company in 2025. A new report suggests that a Galaxy S25 "Slim" model will be available in limited quantities after the Galaxy S25 series debuts. Typically, the Galaxy S series comprises a standard model, a Plus version, and an Ultra variant.
title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Slim to Debut in 2025, Could Rival Purported iPhone 17 Air: Report

description: Microsoft has forecast an increase in spending on AI this quarter and warned of slower growth in its cloud business Azure, even as the company beat Wall Street's estimates for first-quarter revenue and profit.. The Redmond company has signalled that big AI investments were not enough to keep pace with capacity constraints at its data centres.
title: Microsoft Forecasts Slower Cloud Business Growth in Second Quarter

description: Google released the Pixel Weather app with the Pixel 9 lineup in August at its annual Made by Google event. Now the app is making its way to older Pixel smartphones including the Pixel 6 and later, and the Pixel Table. All supported devices are receiving the Pixel Weather app as part of the October Feature Drop.
title: Pixel 9's AI-Powered Pixel Weather App Heading to Pixel 6 and Newer Devices

description: Nintendo has launched a new music app with a library that consists of video game soundtracks from classics like Super Mario and The Legend of Zelda games. It has scores from newer releases as well and newer tracks will be added to the app. Users do not require a Nintendo Switch to access the app, however, they will need a Nintendo Switch Online membership alongside an active Nintendo account.
title: Nintendo Launches Music App That Lets You Stream Video Game Soundtracks

description: NASA successfully reconnected with Voyager 1 after an unexpected communication disruption caused by a shutdown of the spacecraft’s primary transmitter. Engineers at NASA’s Jet Propulsion Laboratory in California pinpointed the cause as Voyager’s fault protection system, which manages power by shutting down non-essential systems. With a secondary transmitter restored, the team is analysing the issue to stabilise Voyager 1, the historic spacecraft still operating in interstellar space 47 years after launch.
title: NASA Engineers Restore Voyager 1 Communications After 15 Billion-Mile Transmission Disruption

description: South Korea’s DGIST has introduced a revolutionary 3D Smart Energy Device that performs both heating and cooling functions, designed to reduce energy consumption in temperature-dependent industries like construction and electronics. The device adjusts to manage temperatures efficiently, relying on a unique structure with radiative cooling and solar heat absorption.
title: DGIST Unveils Dual-Function 3D Smart Energy Device to Reduce Global Energy Use

description: UCLA’s Broad Center researchers have developed an antibody therapy to help the heart heal after a heart attack. This therapy, which blocks the ENPP1 protein, reduces scar tissue formation that can lead to heart failure. Early tests showed that treated animals had less scarring and a reduced risk of severe heart failure. With plans for human trials in 2025, this therapy could be the first of its kind to promote heart repair rather than just manage symptoms.
title: New UCLA Therapy Shows Promise in Preventing Heart Failure After Heart Attacks

description: In a unique approach, African ports are employing trained giant pouched rats to sniff out illegal wildlife goods such as ivory and pangolin scales. This effort, led by APOPO, aims to aid customs officials in identifying smuggled items from endangered species. Agile and cost-effective, these rats are trained to detect specific scents in mock warehouses and are now deployed at some ports, offering a novel tool to combat the wildlife trade.
title: Giant Rats in Africa Trained to Detect Ivory and Wildlife Products at Ports

description: Recent flights by NASA’s ER-2 aircraft have uncovered new types of gamma rays generated by thunderstorms. These observations indicate that gamma-ray glows are more common and long-lasting than previously thought, while newly identified flickering gamma-ray flashes might provide insights into the mechanisms behind lightning formation.
title: NASA's ER-2 Aircraft Unveils Complex Gamma Rays from Thunderstorms

description: In a groundbreaking observation, scientists have recorded the largest marine predation event ever documented, offering unprecedented insights into ocean ecosystem dynamics. Using advanced sonar technology, researchers tracked interactions between capelin, a small forage fish, and their primary predator, cod, as part of a massive, coordinated predation event.
title: Record-Breaking Marine Predation Event Provides Insights into Ocean Ecosystems

description: Eddie Redmayne stars in a modern adaptation of Frederick Forsyth’s thriller The Day of the Jackal. The 10-part series follows Redmayne as an assassin pursued by British intelligence agent Bianca, played by Lashana Lynch, in a suspenseful race. Premiering November 7 on Sky in the UK, November 14 on Peacock in the US, and November 15 on JioCinema in India, the show drops in staggered episodes.
title: Eddie Redmayne Stars in The Day of the Jackal Series on Peacock and JioCinema

description: Suhas’s Janaka Aithe Ganaka, a courtroom comedy-drama, finds a new audience with its digital premiere on Aha from November 8. With Suhas in the lead role, the film follows a unique plot centered around a man’s unusual case against a condom company. Initially released to mixed reviews in theaters, the film promises a fresh opportunity for fans on OTT. Aha Gold subscribers can enjoy exclusive early access on November 7.
title: Janaka Aithe Ganaka Digital Release Date Set: Watch Suhas’s Courtroom Comedy on Aha

description: Netflix’s upcoming animated film Spellbound brings together a star-studded cast with Rachel Zegler as Princess Ellian, alongside John Lithgow, Nicole Kidman, and Javier Bardem. Directed by Vicky Jenson, known for Shrek, the story centres on a young princess racing against time to break a dark spell over her kingdom. Premiering on November 22, Spellbound is a whimsical journey with music by Alan Menken and lyrics by Glenn Slater.
title: Spellbound: Animated Fantasy on Netflix with Rachel Zegler: Release Date, Trailer, Cast

description: Gopichand's latest action-comedy, Viswam, is set to debut on Amazon Prime Video on November 1, coinciding with Diwali celebrations. Directed by Srinu Vaitla, the film features Gopichand in a thrilling role as an agent protecting a family amidst comedic situations. With mixed reviews from its theatrical release, this OTT premiere offers a fresh chance for audiences to enjoy the film from home.
title: Gopichand’s Viswam: OTT Release Date on Amazon Prime Video This Diwali

description: Biomechanics research has revealed the exceptional power and precision of Indigenous Australian weapons, specifically the kodj and leangle. These tools, designed by Aboriginal people for hunting and protection, display remarkable force and accuracy that underscore the sophistication of traditional Aboriginal technology.
title: New Study Unveils Deadly Power and Precision of Indigenous Australian Weapons Kodj and Leangle

description: Washington state recently confirmed four new bird flu cases among farmworkers, bringing the national total to 31. The virus, spread widely among animals, has shown no signs of human-to-human transmission yet, according to health experts. Workers reportedly experienced mild symptoms. As flu season approaches, experts warn of potential viral genetic exchanges, though current transmission risks remain low.
title: Washington Reports Four New Bird Flu Cases in Farmworkers, US Tally Reaches 31

description: In a groundbreaking find, Hong Kong scientists uncovered the city’s first dinosaur fossils on Port Island. The fossils are believed to date back to the Cretaceous period, representing a significant step for local palaeontology. The fossils will be displayed at the Hong Kong Heritage Discovery Centre for public viewing, while Port Island remains temporarily closed to preserve the site for further study.
title: First Dinosaur Fossils Unearthed in Hong Kong’s Port Island, Revealing Ancient History

description: A recent survey by Ohio State University reveals a concerning lack of awareness about pancreatic cancer in adults under 50. With rates rising in this demographic, experts urge better understanding of risk factors, including obesity and lifestyle habits. Preventative measures such as weight management and awareness of family history are emphasised as crucial to reducing risk. However, researchers say more focus on early detection is needed to improve outcomes.
title: Pancreatic Cancer Awareness Low Among Under-50 Adults, Despite Rising Cases

description: Netflix’s six-part series Senna covers Ayrton Senna’s journey from racing rookie to F1 legend. Launching globally on November 29, the series captures his greatest races and close relationships, offering a deep look at the champion’s legacy. Featuring Gabriel Leone as Senna and other cast members as key figures, the show promises an engaging depiction of his life, friendships, and rivalries.
title: Senna Netflix Series: Release Date, Trailer, Cast, and Plot of F1 Legend’s Story

description: The Netflix documentary Nayanthara: Beyond the Fairytale will offer an exclusive look at South Indian actress Nayanthara’s journey. Releasing on November 18, it will feature her wedding to filmmaker Vignesh Shivan and explore her path from a promising debut to superstardom in South Indian cinema. This highly anticipated release includes interviews, behind-the-scenes footage, and rare insights into her personal life, making it a must-watch for fans and newcomers alike.
title: Nayanthara: Beyond the Fairytale; A Documentary on Her Life and Stardom Premiers Soon on Netflix

description: Apple Intelligence can now be accessed while running Windows applications on a Mac computer using Parallels Desktop. The first wave of Apple Intelligence features started its rollout to US users earlier this week with the iOS 18.1 and macOS 15.1 software updates, and Parallels has added support for the feature.
title: Apple Intelligence Writing Tools Support for Windows Apps Arrives on Parallels Desktop

description: Honor Magic 7 series including the Honor Magic 7 and Honor Magic 7 Pro were launched in China on Wednesday. The lineup has now been confirmed to see a global unveiling soon, although an exact date has yet to be announced. The smartphones in the series are powered by Snapdragon 8 Elite chipsets and come with triple rear cameras.
title: Honor Magic 7, Magic 7 Pro Confirmed to Launch Globally Soon

description: OnePlus 13 has been launched in China and the company's new flagship phone is powered by a Snapdragon 8 Elite chip, along with up to 24GB of RAM and up to 1TB of storage. it sports a 6.82-inch AMOLED screen with a 120Hz refresh rate and features a Hasselblad-tuned 50-megapixel triple rear camera setup. It has IP69 and IP6 ratings for dust and water resistance.
title: OnePlus 13 With Snapdragon 8 Elite Chip, 50-Megapixel Triple Rear Camera Setup Launched: Price, Specifications

description: Cyberpunk 2077, the first-person open-world sci-fi adventure game, was first unveiled in 2020. The game is currently available on Xbox Series X/S, PlayStation 5, and PC. However, Mac users will soon be able to enjoy the game as well. During the announcement of the latest M4 chip-powered MacBook Pro laptops, Apple confirmed that the game will be available on Mac devices running Apple silicon in early 2025 alongside a few more titles.
title: Cyberpunk 2077: Ultimate Edition Confirmed to Be Available for Mac in Early 2025

description: Smartphone shipments in India grew 3 percent year-on-year (YoY) for the July-September period (Q3) in 2024, reveals a new report by market research firm Counterpoint. The overall value of smartphones grew by 12 percent in the same quarter compared to last year. Samsung continued to lead the smartphone market with a 23 percent market share, while Apple came in a close second spot, followed by Vivo.
title: India Smartphone Shipments Rise 3 Percent YoY in Q3, Samsung Retains Top Spot: Counterpoint Research

description: Poco F7 Pro and Poco F7 Ultra may launch soon as details of the purported handsets have started doing rounds of the rumour mill. They have been tipped to launch in China as the Redmi K80 and Redmi K80 Pro, respectively. Now, a report has suggested some key features of the rumoured Poco F7 Pro. Another report has hinted at the expected camera specifications of the Poco F7 Ultra variant.
title: Poco F7 Pro Key Features, Poco F7 Ultra Camera Specifications Surface Online

description: Samsung has unveiled the Galaxy S24 series, Galaxy Z series foldables, Galaxy Ring and more this year with several more expected from the brand in 2025. During its latest earnings announcement, Samsung offered a glimpse into its product roadmap for the next year. The South Korean smartphone giant confirmed that the much-awaited Galaxy S25 series will launch in the first half of 2025. It will also reveal its long-awaited XR device soon.
title: Samsung Confirms Launch Timeline of Galaxy S25 Series; First XR Headset to Be Unveiled Soon

description: Samsung Electronics has announced advancements in delivering its cutting-edge AI memory chips to Nvidia providing a measure of confidence to investors concerned about Samsung potentially lagging behind SK Hynix in the fiercely competitive market. The South Korean tech conglomerate has faced challenges in obtaining certification from Nvidia for its newest chips to be used with AI accelerators.
title: Samsung Rises After Signalling Progress With Nvidia on AI Memory

description: Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg said the company will ramp up heavy investments in AI and other futuristic technologies. The Meta executive has warned investors that the firm will continue to spend significantly on infrastructure and other projects like the metaverse and AI-powered glasses.
title: Meta Warns of Worsening AI Losses After Sales Narrowly Beat

description: Honor Watch 5 was launched in China on Wednesday alongside the Honor Magic 7 and Honor Magic 7 Pro. The smartwatch was unveiled globally during IFA Berlin 2024. It comes with a 1.85-inch rectangular AMOLED screen, a rotating crown, and eSIM support. The watch is claimed to offer a battery life of up to 15 days and has an IP68 rating for dust and water resistance.
title: Honor Watch 5 With 1.85-Inch AMOLED Screen, eSIM Support Launched: Price, Specifications

description: Nokia 108 4G (2024) and Nokia 125 4G (2024) have been launched as the latest feature phones by HMD. They come with wireless FM radio support and have an MP3 player. Both phones include Nokia's classic Snake game. The Nokia 108 4G (2024) and Nokia 125 4G feature a 2.0-inch display with the former packing a 1,450mAh battery, and the latter carrying a 1,000mAh cell.
title: Nokia 108 4G (2024), Nokia 125 4G (2024) Announced With Wireless FM Radio, Snake Game

description: One UI 7 was briefly teased by the company at its annual developer conference, and a publication has now leaked the design and features arriving with the upcoming update. While One UI 7 isn't expected to arrive until early 2025, it will reportedly bring several improvements to the interface, while introducing new parental controls and AI-powered features.
title: Samsung's One UI 7 Update to Introduce Smart Notification Management, Redesigned Icons and New AI Features

description: Google Pixel 11a is expected to be launched in 2027 alongside the Pixel Tablet 3 and both of these devices will reportedly feature Google's Tensor G6 chip, but a new report suggests these processors will not be as capable as the ones powering other models in the Pixel 11 series. The Pixel Tablet 3 is also expected to arrive with an additional USB Type-C port controller for more advanced users, with support for DisplayPort output.
title: Google Pixel 11a, Pixel Tablet 3 to Be Equipped With Less Capable Tensor G6 Chip: Report

description: Honor Magic 7 and Honor Magic 7 Pro were launched in China on Thursday. The smartphones are powered by Qualcomm's newest octa-core Snapdragon 8 Elite chipsets paired with up to 16GB of RAM. The phones are equipped with triple rear camera units including telephoto shooters. They carry 50-megapixel front cameras and come with IP68 and IP69 ratings.
title: Honor Magic 7, Magic 7 Pro With Snapdragon 8 Elite SoCs, 80W Wireless Charging Launched: Price, Specifications

description: Apple has announced a RAM upgrade for the MacBook Air lineup alongside new MacBook Pro models with M4 chips. In a surprise move, the Cupertino-based company has doubled the base RAM configuration on M2 and M3 MacBook Air models to 16GB, from the current 8GB, without a corresponding price increase. Besides RAM, nothing else will change about the laptops.
title: MacBook Air With M2 and M3 Chips Now Start With 16GB RAM
